short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A middlefinger to every extension, translate anything for free with no limits

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
âœ¨ A translator extension!âœ¨ 
that is useful for translating raws of manga, or any image!
To any other language you want!

âœ¨ For FREE, with NO LIMITS, no membership, no trial, just works. via an API exploit I made. âœ¨

Truly free, not like those other annoying extension options we have.
Complete with a 'lil bit of soul / annoying music, like every good creation should have >:)
And excessive weird sound effects / deranged visuals.

You can also translate multiple images on a website in bulk, up to around 10 at once before it starts bugging out.

I made this as a middle-finger to all the extensions out there,
As I want to read more weird obscure manga,
without dying over my very bad hiragana and katakana skills


ðŸ’”warnings / bonus notesðŸ’”
If it goes down / stops working / becomes really slow,
that's not my fault or issue, as this uses requests and api's that I don't have control over,
and any such issue may be beyond my own control.

Also this obviously only works on sites where images can actually be obtained from,
so certain sites containing untranslated raws, that don't have easily obtainable image embeds, won't be as easy to process obviously. so pick your sources well.
Certain low quality websites and redistributors are good for this.
